content.text:
## Vegan junkfood megapost

It's winter here and [@Kathleen Marie](@GSuGLzJa8t3aJCLvs66Ekn7MXdr3yqCSzsd6z2iUEBY=.ed25519)
 and I have been eating a lot of really tasty food lately. I swear we don't always eat pizza, but it *is* fun to take photos of.

I'll usually try to follow a recipe, but Kathleen is a wizard and just comes up with recipes on the fly and they almost always turn out perfectly. I don't know how she does it, but it's super impressive.

Enough talking, it's photo time!

## Lasagna

![vegan lasagna](&rG0eLE85TrP/rsTBMnujukxMxEJWtYCesAcAlViuqlg=.sha256)

![vegan lasagna in a bowl.jpg](&toH5dHkmrQqjAQZ323Z/1NLI6C+cz1SZ6JVQw13xDQM=.sha256)
